rows.label: tlk00340102_msg0001
rows.name:
Never imagined that the
Holy Grail's troupe would
be a buncha kids...

rows.label: tlk00340102_msg0002
rows.name:
Don't take it the wrong way. I'm just
surprised. You musta had it real tough.

rows.label: tlk00340102_msg0003
rows.name:
Our Boss is really concerned about
you lot. Don't you worry, there ain't a
person here who thinks badly of you.

rows.label: tlk00340102_msg0004
rows.name:
You can rest easy here in Hr√¶svelgr.
Take some time to recuperate.
